feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [BHS1A][Managed vSphere] - Storage maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 30, 07:30 - 22:00 UTC

Sep 29, 07:58 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Managed vSphere offer.

Start time : 30/10/2025 07:30 UTC
End time : 30/10/2025 22:00 UTC
Service impact : There will be no impact on the vSphere UI, data availability, or virtual machines during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an update for multiple storage servers.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [RBX2d][Managed vSphere] - Cluster11012 incident notification
entry.content:
Sep 29, 09:05 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that we had an incident on the specific Cluster11012 in RBX2d.
This incident has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 29/09/2025 08:40 UTC
End time : 29/09/2025 08:54 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Cluster11012 was temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers were temporarily unable to access their data on the specified cluster.
Root Cause : This incident was caused by the maintenance described below
https://network.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/vpgjv44vg7hz

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

entry.title: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - vSphere maintenance notification
entry.content:
Sep 29, 07:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Sep 10, 22:06 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Managed vSphere offer.

Start time : 29/09/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 02/10/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : vSphere will not be accessible and the hosts will be put into maintenance mode during the operation. If the host has virtual machines, a vMotion will be performed.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our Managed vSphere offer.
An individual communication will be done to inform customers.
Customers can reschedule the operation through the manager.

Thank you for your understanding

entry.title: [RBX8][Managed vSphere] - Rack R803L14 incident notification
entry.content:
Sep 18, 13:56 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on our Managed vSphere offering has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 18/09/2025 10:26 UTC
End time : 18/09/2025 12:22 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by an electrical equipment issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Sep 18, 12:22 UTC
Monitoring - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : All hosts in rack R803L14 are available again.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are currently monitoring the situation.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Sep 18, 10:50 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating an incident affecting our Managed vSphere offering, which is causing temporary availability issue in the rack R803L14.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 18/09/2025 10:26 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : All hosts located in the rack R803L14 are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access and use their hosts located in the specified rack.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident to fix it.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
